title: Unknown Error when trying to purchase IP Chromas
body:
Trying to buy the Chromas that are on sale for IP today and I am getting an error message that says "Unable to Purchase Item(s): Unknown Error" 
Is anyone else experiencing this?

replies.body: Is this error happening on the updated or legacy client?  I looked into this for you and saw that you successfully purchased quite a bit of chromas!  Are you still having this issue?
